abstract: Mobile devices, including smartphones and tablets, account for 7 percent of all worldwide traffic on the Web, according to a report issued Tuesday. Owners of Apple devices use the Internet far more than owners of other kinds of mobile devices.
snippet: Mobile devices, including smartphones and tablets, account for 7 percent of all worldwide traffic on the Web, according to a report issued Tuesday. Owners of Apple devices use the Internet far more than owners of other kinds of mobile devices.
lead_paragraph: The prediction that Internet traffic originating from mobile devices will eventually exceed that of desktop computers connected to the Internet is on its way to a reality.

headline.main: Mobile Devices Account for a Growing Portion of Web Traffic
